sentences.en: Age diminishes the heart's ability to pump harder and faster under exertion.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增加，人在消耗体力时心脏的输血能力和输血速度会有所减弱。

sentences.en: All kids her age do silly things; it's nothing to worry about.
sentences.cn: 她这个年龄的孩子都会做傻事，根本不用担心。

sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: Dad retired at the age of 56.
sentences.cn: 爸爸是在56岁时退休的。

sentences.en: Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.cn: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.en: Few jockeys continue race-riding beyond the age of 40.
sentences.cn: 很少有职业赛马骑师超过40岁仍继续参加赛马的。

sentences.en: Francis is the same age as me.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.en: Hay fever is an affliction which arrives at an early age.
sentences.cn: 枯草热是年纪较小时会患的一种病。

sentences.en: He died in a nursing home at the age of 87.
sentences.cn: 他在一家养老院去世，享年87岁。

sentences.en: He knew what he wanted to do from the age of 14.
sentences.cn: 他14岁起就知道自己日后干什么了。

sentences.en: He started piano lessons at the age of 7.
sentences.cn: 他7岁开始上钢琴课。

sentences.en: He was worried to see how much she’d aged.
sentences.cn: 看到她苍老了许多，他很担心。

sentences.en: I'm only 5ft tall, and I look younger than my age.
sentences.cn: 我才5英尺高，显得比实际年龄小。

sentences.en: In some cases there is a mini-mum age limit.
sentences.cn: 有些情况下有最低年龄限制。

sentences.en: It infected them with some of the magic of a lost age.
sentences.cn: 逝去的岁月让他们平添了几分魅力。

sentences.en: Men tend to put on weight in middle age.
sentences.cn: 男人到了中年往往会发福。

sentences.en: She's indexed the book by author, by age, and by illustrator.
sentences.cn: 她根据作者、年龄和插图画家分别为该书编了索引。

sentences.en: the children all seemed of an age.
sentences.cn: 孩子们看起来差不多大。

sentences.en: the sons are of an age to marry.
sentences.cn: 儿子们到了结婚的年龄。

sentences.en: This age-old struggle for control had led to untold bloody wars.
sentences.cn: 这场由来已久的对控制权的争夺已经引发了无数流血的战争。

sentences.en: We are living in the age of technology.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在科技时代。

sentences.en: When I was your age I walked five miles to school.
sentences.cn: 我像你这么大时，要步行5英里去上学。

words.tran_cn: 年老的；…岁的；老年人特有的
歧视老年人（尤指在就业和住房方面）
老化（age的过去式）；成熟；变老
使成熟；使变老，使上年纪

phrases.tran_cn: 法定年龄：到达一定年龄，例如18岁或21岁，不再享受国家的诸如教育或保护的某些特殊照顾
（人）成年（英国法律现规定18岁成年，原为21岁）
随着年龄的增长；因年久

trans.tran_cn: 年龄（段），寿命，时代，陈年，破旧，期
trans.tran_en: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed
to start looking older or to make someone or something look older
